title: Where does the plastic in our oceans come from?
body: Most of the plastic in our oceans comes from land-based sources: by weight, 70% to 80% is plastic that is transported from land to the sea via rivers or coastlines. 1 The other 20% to 30% comes from marine sources such as fishing nets, lines, ropes, and abandoned vessels. 2
